snippet: The president assailed Donald J. Trump and the G.O.P. for peddling policies he said benefited the rich at the expense of a struggling middle class.
abstract: Pres Obama delivers speech in Elkhart, Ind, in which he criticizes Donald J Trump and Republican Party for advocating policies that will benefit rich at expense of rest of country; Obama frames 2016 election as one between Democratic Party that cares for working families and Republican Party, which he says does not; is Obama's first major foray into presidential campaign.
lead_paragraph: The president assailed Donald J. Trump and the G.O.P. for peddling policies he said benefited the rich at the expense of a struggling middle class.

headline.main: Obama Wades Into Election Debate With Indiana Speech
headline.print_headline: Obama Wades Into Election Fray With Speech Assailing Trump and G.O.P.
